qas.question: Which parent of Beyonce's help co-write a book?
Which African-American woman before Beyonce had posed for SI Swimsuit issue?
What was the title of Beyonce's mother's book?
When was she on the Sports Illustrated cover?
Who was she the second  African American on the cover after?
Beyoncé was the second African American woman featured as a swimsuit cover on the magazine, who was first?
What magazine said Beyoncé was the "best-dressed celebrity"?

context: According to Italian fashion designer Roberto Cavalli, Beyoncé uses different fashion styles to work with her music while performing. <a0_0>Her mother<a0_0/> co-wrote a book, published in 2002, titled <a2_0>Destiny's Style<a2_0/> an account of how fashion had an impact on the trio's success. The B'Day Anthology Video Album showed many instances of fashion-oriented footage, depicting classic to contemporary wardrobe styles. In <a3_0>2007<a3_0/>, Beyoncé was featured on the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue, becoming the second African American woman after <a1_0><a4_0><a5_0>Tyra Banks<a5_0/><a4_0/><a1_0/>, and <a6_0>People<a6_0/> magazine recognized Beyoncé as the best-dressed celebrity.
